data.actual_result: It just doesn't save and won't bring you back either. Also the message that the card was declined appears in the Billing tab instead, if you click "add payment method" you can see the error there if you select credit card
data.expected_result: It brings you to the beginning saying things went wrong like with the 49.99$ option
data.short_description: When choosing 4.99$ option for Nitro and entering credit card with insufficient funds won't bring you back to the beginning telling you there is an error [Mac specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Nitro tab - Click on the 4.99$ option - Enter a card with insufficient funds - Save that info - Observe nothing happens
